content:
Happy to announce that we've open-sourced a new Swift FHIR data model library today! :party_ball:
https://github.com/apple/FHIRModels/

And a talk to introduce it:
https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2020/10669

(cross posting from #tooling: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179239-tooling/topic/Swift.20FHIRModels)
